channel.description: Recent content in Streaming on XeroLinux HQ

item.title: Spotube a better alternative to Spotify
item.description: What is it ? # It’s an Open Source Spotify client that doesn’t require Premium nor uses Electron! Available for both desktop & mobile! Following are the features that currently spotube offers:

item.title: OBS Studio Official Package
item.description: What is OBS-Studio ? # OBS Studio is a free and open-source, cross-platform screencasting and streaming app. It is available for Windows, macOS, Linux distributions, and BSD. The OBS Project raises funds on Open Collective and Patreon.

item.title: Stremio - Best Streaming tool
item.description: What is Stremio? # Stremio is a one-stop hub for video content aggregation. Discover, organize and watch video from all kind of sources on any device that you own. Movies, TV shows, series, live television or web channels like YouTube and Twitch.
